project_name.justification: The text consistently refers to the project as the Phoenix Silver Project, for example: 'SILVER ONE COMPLETES THE 100% ACQUISITION OF ITS PHOENIX SILVER PROJECT IN ARIZONA'.

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the text as: 'Silver One Resources Inc. (TSXV: SVE) (OTCQX: SLVRF) (FSE: BRK1) ("Silver One" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has exercised its option to acquire a 100% interest in the high-grade Phoenix Silver Project...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer is identified in the text: 'Greg Crowe, President and CEO of Silver One commented: "Acquiring a 100% interest in Phoenix Silver represents a rare opportunity..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states: 'Silver One... is pleased to announce that it has exercised its option to acquire a 100% interest in the high-grade Phoenix Silver Project...'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata identifies the primary commodity as Ag, and the project is consistently referred to as a silver project, e.g., 'The Silver Phoenix Project is a very high-grade native silver prospect that lies within the "Arizona Silver Belt"'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article titled 'Silver One Expands Its Land Position... at Its Phoenix Silver Project, Arizona' and other provided articles are directly about the project of interest.

currency.justification: The cash payment portion of the acquisition is specified in US dollars: 'In order to acquire a 100% interest in the Phoenix Silver Project, Silver One paid US$350,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition terms include a cash payment: 'In order to acquire a 100% interest in the Phoenix Silver Project, Silver One paid US$350,000 and issued ten million common shares of Silver One over 3 years to the property vendors.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction involved issuing shares, but no explicit monetary value for the share component was provided in the text.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction terms were provided as separate cash and share components, not a single combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The acquisition terms include the issuance of shares: 'In order to acquire a 100% interest in the Phoenix Silver Project, Silver One paid US$350,000 and issued ten million common shares of Silver One over 3 years to the property vendors.'

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued, but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback from the detailed quote section of the acquisition announcement (Feb 8, 2024): 'Last: 0.27'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction terms include a retained royalty by the seller: 'The central portion of the claim block is subject to a 2% NSR, which can be purchased for US$ 1.0 million.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The total area of the project is stated as: 'The Project now covers 6,141 hectares (15,175 acres)...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the project area is specified in the text: 'The Project now covers 6,141 hectares (15,175 acres)...'

resource_size.justification: The text describes high-grade vein fragments and select samples (e.g., 'a 189 kg (417 lb.) specimen'), but does not provide a formal, quantified mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the news release header: 'Silver One Resources Inc. (TSXV: SVE) (OTCQX: SLVRF) (FSE: BRK1)'.
